code:
import turtle
t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pencolor('white')

for i in range(2):
   t1.forward(200)
   t1.right(90)
   t1.forward(100)
   t1.right(90)

guide.img: Our Turtle will go forward by 200 pixels, turn right and then go forward for 100 pixels, and turn right again. we are going to repeat this 2 times, hence drawing our rectangle
